name: rabbinical

relating to rabbis (= Jewish religious leaders): a rabbinical student/college Rabbinical scholars memorize vast passages from the Torah. His views were influential in the development of later rabbinic Judaism.
More examplesFewer examplesRabbinical tradition tells of Noah planting his vines.rabbinical authoritiesThe criminal was brought before the rabbinical court. These teachings are preserved in many forms of rabbinic literature.
